Text.Page:
Have you seen the sinister people roaming the basement? They're {@LinkCreature:25#3012#shurian champions}. Everyone thought they disappeared with the devan Dark Empire, but they're definitely here. We think they might be members of the Atel Akaad.

Let's drive them to extinction for real this time! Take them out and bring back their emblems.
Not bad at all! Even better, these emblems are full of mana, and can be used to activate the teleportal. Good going!
Come onâ€”I really need those emblems.
